definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: city on border of Asher Jos 19:27, mod. Kâbûl, 4 h. (9 miles) SE. from Akko, Rob:BR iii, 88 Guêrin:Gal, i. 422 f.

[[אֶרֶץ כָּבוּל]] district in Galilee 1Ki 9:13 containing 20 cities given by Sol. to Hiram (popular etymol. poss. [[כּ]] as + [[בֻּל]] = [[בַּל]] not, i.e. as good as nothing, cf. v:1Ki 9:12, so Ew Th; Klo conject. [[ארץ גׇּלִיל]]), Buhl:Geogr. § 116.
